title: Links, Anchors, and Snippets
text: Mass parsing of organic search results. As a result, you receive a structured document

title: Parsing Advertising Blocks
text: Collection of all data from advertising blocks, including position on the search results page

title: Parsing by GEO
text: Parsing Ahrefs rank and domain rating, backlinks and domains, TOP100 backlinks

title: Competition of Keywords
text: As a result of parsing, the user receives data on the number of results in the search results for the query

title: Related Keywords Block Parsing
text: Parsing blocks with related search queries and the ability to parse them in depth

title: Mobile and Desktop Search Results
text: Results differ depending on the device, A-Parser supports both options

title: Support for Search Operators
text: Support for all search operators to expand parsing capabilities

title: Maximum Parsing Depth
text: Navigation through all pages of the search results and automatic bypass of restrictions to obtain all results

title: Parsing News Results
text: Collection of such data: link to the article, title, brief content of the news, and update date

title: Typo Detection
text: The parser determines whether the search engine considered the received query as a typo

title: Sorting Results by Date
text: The function of sorting by date is available for collecting the most current search results

title: Captcha Bypass Capability
text: Support for all popular recognition services, as well as integration with XEvil and CapMonster
